actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: To authorize a land exchange involving the Cleveland National Forest, California, and a corresponding boundary adjustment for the forest, and for other purposes.
short_title: Cleveland National Forest Land Exchange Act of 1992

summary.text: Cleveland National Forest Land Exchange Act of 1992 - Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to convey certain land in the Cleveland National Forest, California, to the Orange County Council of the Boy Scouts of America in exchange for specified land in San Diego County, California, which shall become part of such Forest.

titles.title: Cleveland National Forest Land Exchange Act of 1992
To authorize a land exchange involving the Cleveland National Forest, California, and a corresponding boundary adjustment for the forest, and for other purposes.
